tasks.task: Market products and develop a marketing plan
subtasks: Think about marketing plan before purchasing seeds
Research marketing factors such as product quality, quantity, uniqueness, timing, location, and relationships
Tailor marketing plan based on capabilities and product characteristics
Plan to sell multiple products at various markets
Stay organized to handle tasks effectively
Write down plans and track progress with tools like farm management software
Document financial information including budgets, crop records, expenses, and tax documents
Regularly review and adjust business plans and records for improvement
Consider the benefits of good financial records even without regulatory requirements
Start small to manage growing the operation over time
Adjust and try new marketing strategies as needed
Cultivate relationships with organizations and individuals that can support business goals
